notes.title: Authors’ contributions
notes.p: RP and SS equally contributed to the conception and drafting of the manuscript, as well as the analysis. Both authors read and approved the final version.

sec.title: Authors’ information
sec.p: Both authors were not involved in any proposed Zika virus human challenge trials as investigators or part of the research team but served as independent reviewers serving on a panel evaluating the ethics of Zika virus human challenge trials.
